org.archive.crawler.fetcher

类 HeritrixSSLProtocolSocketFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.archive.crawler.fetcher.HeritrixSSLProtocolSocketFactory
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.protocol.ProtocolSocketFactory, org.apache.commons.httpclient.protocol.SecureProtocolSocketFactory

    public class HeritrixSSLProtocolSocketFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.commons.httpclient.protocol.SecureProtocolSocketFactory
    Implementation of the commons-httpclient SSLProtocolSocketFactory so we can return SSLSockets whose trust manager is ConfigurableX509TrustManager. We also go to the heritrix cache to get IPs to use making connection. To this, we have dependency on HeritrixProtocolSocketFactory; its assumed this class and it are used together. See HeritrixProtocolSocketFactory.getHostAddress(ServerCache,String).
    另请参阅:
    ConfigurableX509TrustManager
